name: RoRope
description:
PARKUR, ROPE SWING, GUNS, ...

Parkour, shooting, jumping and swinging on the rope will not miss you in this game! Shoot enemies, jump heavy parkour and swing on a rope! Play levels, or earn lots of coins in WAVE game mode.

NORMAL MODE

You can play 10 different levels from the simplest to the most difficulty.

WAVE MODE

Enemies are being spwning in waves and only YOU can stop it. Try get the biggest score. The best way to get a lot of coins!

Level choosing Wave mode in action WHAT CAN YOU SEE IN THE GAME?
  • Action
  • Parkour
  • Rope swing
  • Shooting
  • Guns
  • And so much FUN
WHERE YOU CAN SUPORT ME?

You can support me with subscribe on my YouTube chanel, or with follow on my Twitter, or you can visit my websites.

CONTROLS
  • A, D - move left and right
  • SPACE or W - jump
  • DOUBLE SPACE - double jump
  • E - Pick up gun and throw gun
  • LEFT CLICK - shoot bullet or shoot rope
HOW TO DOWNLOAD
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on RoRope.exe
